question: Which of the following is correct about Kinetic energy during the projectile motion?
option1: it is minimum at the point of projection
option2: it is minimum at the highest point
option3: it is maximum at the highest point
option4: it is minimum at the point of reaching the ground
answer: it is minimum at the highest point
explanation: The Kinetic energy of an object is maximum at the point of projection or at the point of reaching the ground. It is minimum at the highest point.
